name: jerseynexus
description: Complete sportswear e-commerce platform for Nepal

scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend; npm run install:backend
scripts.dev: echo "Run 'npm run dev:frontend' and 'npm run dev:backend' in separate terminals"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend; npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend; npm run test:frontend
scripts.db:migrate: Set-Location backend; npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:reset: Set-Location backend; npx prisma migrate reset

author: JerseyNexus Team
